__TOC__

=== Tilix 2.0 Karposh ===

* Arch: i386 (or i686) and support for Intel Mac.

* Linux kernel 2.6.17.2

* Glibc 2.4 (huge testing needed)

* Main filesystem: XFS

* Full NTFS write support via FUSE (http://tinyurl.com/evecu)

* Xorg 7.0.22 (or precompiled 7.1)

* KDE 3.5.3 with many GUI updates

* OpenOffice.org 2.0.2

* WengoPhone 2.0

* Krita 1.5.2

* NX client, torrent client, control center and new video player.

* Full ALSA support

* Three CDs: Install, Live and Extra.
